price: Y agregarán: "Si hubiéramos oído o reflexionado, no estaríamos ahora con los condenados al Fuego".
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ كُنَّا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū law kunnā nasmaʿu aw naʿqilu mā kunnā fī aṣḥābi al-saʿīri
